r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version and CLI output script
r.n:
* bugs - 15011 : XSL extension not detected
* news - API 1.9.0 marked as beta, and first release is alpha due to change of classes/constants detection of PHP extensions.
You are welcome to read my presentation about the new API at http://pear.laurent-laville.org/pepr/PHP_CompatInfo/api190/
Do not hesitate to give me your feedback. More we test it, more stable will be the final release.
* roadmap - 2008-11-23 first alpha version - 2008-12-19 stable release 1.9.0
